segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene, and it's quite something to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, water pouring over the edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the faucet is fully on, but the drain isn't doing its job at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands right in front of it, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually submerged in a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm utterly surprised she hasn't noticed the gushing water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely unaware of what's happening just inches away?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The waste of water is quite disheartening to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm a bit fearful for the floorboards and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mess is only getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems lost in her own little world of dish duty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sadness for the potential damage to the house.
segments.speaker: PAR
